p:
The LOD and LOQ were calculated from the calibration curve according to
(1)
LOD =
3.3 σ
s
,
(2)
LOQ =
10 σ
s
,
where σ is the standard deviation of the response and s is the slope of the calibration curve. The residual standard deviation of the line regression or the standard deviation of y-intercepts of the line regression may be used as the standard deviation.
